5. Dakhal's nature: - You are my only son. Out of my natural affection for you, I have a desire to give you some immovable property. Therefore, in fulfillment of that desire, I hereby transfer to you, free of charge, the RCC roofed terrace and ACC sheet house built by me, which is registered in the records of the Gram Panchayat as Door No. 18-250 and Assessment No. 1839, and which has been in my possession till today, including the wooden furniture installed in the said house, which is in my complete possession and enjoyment. From now on, you, your sons, grandsons, descendants If any suit or action arises due to any impediments of cognizance, I will avoid all such suits at my own expense and execute the said property to you without any hindrance. I hereby give you full assurance that, apart from the delivery of the said property to you on this day, I have not made any pledge, guarantee, sale agreement, court attachment, injunction order, etc. to any other person and I hereby issue this deed of delivery in your name on this day. From now on, you can pay the taxes, cesses, etc. payable to the Government or the Panchayat on the said property. The deed is made by the Government vide Ordinance No. 9/77 is not an assigned property.
Party Declaration:- I hereby certify that there are no mango, coconut, sweet potato, betel nut, etc. plantations or trees in the area transferred by this deed. If any such fact is found to have been concealed in this deed, I shall be liable to prosecution and payment of depreciation duty as per law.
Sambasiva Rao

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: TULLUR/REST ALL(0-13) W-B: 0-13 SURVEY: 154-A HOUSE: 13-250 EXTENT: 152SQ.Yds BUILT: 588SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: PANCHAYATHI BAZAAR 36.6 FT [S] SHAIK MAHABHUBHEE PROPERTY 36.6 FT [E]: BHANAVATH GANDHI NAIK PROPERTY 37.6 FT [W]: PANCHAYATHI BAZAAR 37.6 FT
encumbranceDetails.deedValue: 0302 Gift Settlement in f/o family Mkt.Value:Rs. 1430320 Cons.Value:Rs. 1544000

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 24 of 2026, dated 20/Jan/2026, executed by Puli Sambasiva Rao in favour of his Son, Puli Ramakrishna, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 152 Sq. Yds or 1368 Sq. Ft, bearing house number 13-250, Assessment number 1839, comprised in survey number 154-A, situated in Thullur Village and Grama Panchayat, Thullur Mandal, within the District of Guntur, registered at sub-registrar office Ananthavaram(733) is bounded as follows: North by: Panchayathi Bazaar – 36.6 feet South by: Shaik Mahabhubhee Property – 36.6 feet East by: Bhanavath Gandhi Naik Property – 37.6 feet West by: Panchayathi Bazaar – 37.6 feet

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 154-A, bearing house no.13-250, situated in Thullur Village, measuring about 152 Sq. Yds. (or) 1368 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Puli Sambasiva Rao, who acquired the property through Inheitance from his Ancestors. [Ref:Deed] 2. The aforementioned Puli Sambasiva Rao executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 20/Jan/2026 registered as document No. 24 of 2026, before the SRO Ananthavaram, in favour of his Son, Puli Ramakrishna, towards the property measuring 152 Sq. Yds. (or) 1368 Sq. Ft., bearing house no. 13-250, Assessment number 1839, comprised in survey number 154-A, situated in Thullur Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : The Property Tax Receipt No.TAX19012026123622592, dated 18/Jan/2026, imprinted by the Thullur Grama Panchayath Secretary, discloses that Puli Sambasiva Rao, has paid property tax for the period 2025-2026, towards house number 13-250.
The HTR attached discloses that Puli Sambasiva Rao is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Puli Ramakrishna.

Registered Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deeds*Registered Memorandum of Deposit of Title Deeds to be executed by  Puli Ramakrishna, in favour of Vistaar Finance, towards the schedule property*----*Original

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Puli Ramakrishna, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 152 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 13-250, Assessment number 1839, comprised in survey number 154-A, situated in Thullur Village and Grama Panchayat, Thullur Mandal, within the District of Guntur, registered at subregistrar office Ananthavaram.

Note:It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
